required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Bilateral Dispensing Study of MyDay Toric, 1-day Acuvue Moist for Astigmatism, and Dailies Aquacomfort Plus Toric Lenses
clinical_study.official_title: Bilateral Dispensing Study of MyDay Toric, 1-day Acuvue Moist for Astigmatism, and Dailies Aquacomfort Plus Toric Lenses

brief_summary.textblock: Bilateral dispensing study of MyDay Toric, 1-day Acuvue Moist for Astigmatism, and Dailies Aquacomfort Plus Toric lenses

detailed_description.textblock: Prospective, double-masked (investigator and participant), bilateral, randomized, cross-over dispensing study comparing the MyDay Toric (test) against the 1-day Acuvue Moist for Astigmatism (control), and Dailies Aquacomfort Plus Toric (control) lenses

primary_outcome.description: Subjective ratings of lens performance for comfort assessed. Comfort Scale 0-10, 0=painful, 10=can't feel the lenses.
Subjective ratings of lens performance for dryness assessed. Dryness Scale 0-10, 0=extremely dry, 10=no dryness
Subjective ratings of lens performance for visual quality assessed. Visual quality Scale 0-10, 0=completely dissatisfied, 10=completely satisfied

primary_outcome.measure: Lens preference with respect to overall comfort
primary_outcome.description: Overall comfort preference of MyDay Toric, 1-Day Acuvue Moist Toric or Dailies Aquacomfort Plus Toric lenses. Scale: Prefer MyDay Toric, 1-Day Acuvue Moist Toric or Dailies Aquacomfort Plus Toric lenses each: strong or slight or no-preference

primary_outcome.measure: Lens preference with respect to visual quality
primary_outcome.description: Overall vision quality preference of MyDay Toric, 1-Day Acuvue Moist Toric or Dailies Aquacomfort Plus Toric lenses. Scale: Prefer MyDay Toric, 1-Day Acuvue Moist Toric or Dailies Aquacomfort Plus Toric lenses each: strong or slight or no-preference

arm_group.arm_group_label: MyDay A Toric daily disposable contact lens
arm_group.description: Participants were randomized to wear a new pair of MyDay Toric lenses each day for one week during the cross over study

arm_group.arm_group_label: 1-Day Acuvue Moist toric daily disposable contact lenses
arm_group.description: Participants were randomized to wear a new pair of 1-Day Acuvue Moist Toric lenses each day for one week during the cross over study

arm_group.arm_group_label: Dailies Aquacomfort Plus toric daily disposable contact lenses
arm_group.description: Participants were randomized to wear a new pair of Dailies Aquacomfort Plus Toric lenses each day for one week during the cross over study

intervention.intervention_name: Dailies Aquacomfort Plus toric daily disposable contact lenses
intervention.arm_group_label: Dailies Aquacomfort Plus toric daily disposable contact lenses

intervention.intervention_name: 1-Day Acuvue Moist toric daily disposable contact lenses
intervention.arm_group_label: 1-Day Acuvue Moist toric daily disposable contact lenses

intervention.intervention_name: MyDay A Toric daily disposable contact lens
intervention.arm_group_label: MyDay A Toric daily disposable contact lens
